text: The 1999–2000 Tetley's Bitter Rugby Union County Championship was the 100th edition of England's County Championship rugby union club competition. Yorkshire won their 13th title, after defeating Devon in the final. == Final == {| width="80%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |- !width="20"|
